text:
These picks for the best yoga pants are as functional on the mat as they are stylish off of it.

01 of 16 The Best Yoga Pants for Women bymuratdeniz/Getty Images Long gone are the days where the only reason you'd wear yoga pants is to do, you know, yoga. Yoga pants have worked their way into the athleisure and just straight leisure world by storm, and for good reason — they offer a stylish look for any body type, are one of the most flattering workout clothes options, can be versatile enough to wear both on and off the yoga mat, and most importantly, they're crazy comfortable. When shopping for the best yoga pants, consider their purpose in your life. If you plan on sporting them to your next gym sesh or hot yoga class, look for pairs made with performance-ready fabrics that'll keep you cool during the sweatiest workouts. Or if you prefer something that you can lounge in at home, opt for cotton yoga pants that'll feel soft and comfortable enough for everyday wear. And if you plan to practice outdoors on a chilly morning, consider fleece-lined leggings for extra warmth. Now that this style has become so popular, there are tons of different yoga pants for women to choose from. To help you sift through the seemingly endless options of the most flattering workout clothes, consult this guide, which includes options from a variety of brands and a range of price points. And while you've probably heard fitness fanatics rave about Lululemon's yoga pants and leggings and their cult following, these top-notch picks boast similar features — but at lower prices. The 10 Best Lululemon Dupes You Can Score On Amazon Whether you're a seasoned yogi on the hunt for a sweat-wicking style for your next Bikram class, or a casual wearer wanting a seamless and flattering high-waisted yoga pant to wear for running errands, you'll find what works for you here. Keep scrolling for the best yoga pants for women that offer a flattering fit and stylish, versatile look that can be paired with any outfit.

02 of 16 Alo Yoga High-Waist Goddess Legging Buy It, $102 alo A favorite among dedicated yogis, these leggings feature a ribbed, scrunch-able bottom half that can be worn on the leg or pulled down over the heels for better grip and added coziness. While they might seem like a splurge, shoppers note that they are "definitely worth every penny." One reviewer wrote: "I love my new Alo Yoga leggings. They don't slip down and I feel cozy with them around my heels. Well made and comfy."

03 of 16 Onzie High Rise Leggings Buy It, $69 Onzie/Shopbop Onzie's yoga clothes are all ultra light and quick-drying, perfect for intense yoga sessions filled with double Chaturangas. What's more, the bold leopard print and flattering high-waisted fit will make you feel like the most stylish yogi in class. One fan noted that they are even fashionable enough to wear outside of the yoga or Pilates studio: "I got these for Christmas last year and I wear them all the time! I love that they're seamless, it makes them super comfortable. They are cute enough to wear out and about with a sweater and boots."

04 of 16 RBX Active Women's Cotton Strappy Side Yoga Capri Buy It, from $20 RBX/Amazon These strappy cropped leggings are as stylish as they are comfortable. The cotton fabric blend and four-way stretch technology mean these yoga pants are lightweight, soft, and give you complete freedom of movement. They also have a high-waisted fit (a quality to seek out if you're on the hunt for the most flattering workout clothes), use flat-lock stitching so you never have to worry about irritation or chafing, and feature cutouts at the calf for added airflow to keep you cool while you flow. "I love RBX leggings for yoga, barre, and everything else," shared a customer. "They are cute, comfortable, and I now only buy their leggings."

05 of 16 Zella Live In High Waist Leggings Buy It, $59 Zella These high-waisted leggings from Nordstrom's Zella activewear line are ideal for everything from restorative flows to more high-impact Pilates, since they are made from moisture-wicking fabric to keep you cool and comfortable as you start to sweat. They also feature a no-slip waistband, non-irritating flat-lock seams, and an elastic waistband with a hidden pocket for your credit card or keys. "By far the best leggings that I own, and I own A LOT," said a shopper. "I always prefer a high-waisted pair because it sucks everything in and these absolutely do the job. I first bought the Lululemon Wunder Under high-waist leggings but when I got home I couldn't justify the price ($106). So I searched for some here and gave these a chance since they were half the price. And I can easily say they are 99 percent identical, minus minor differences. These are NOT see-through and are great quality. I hope these will be permanent in their collection and I will definitely get another pair soon."

06 of 16 90 Degree by Reflex High Waist Power Flex Legging Buy It, from $23 90 Degree by Reflex/Amazon Consistently rated as some of the best yoga pants in the game and with more than 10,000 five-star ratings from Amazon shoppers, these super-soft high-rise leggings come in a variety of shades and create a smooth silhouette. These versatile pants are the perfect addition to any outfit inside or outside the gym. One reviewer raved: "I'm going to live in these! These pants are actually impressive, even my husband thought so when I opened the box and after I put them on. They are definitely a yoga pant rather than a legging and absolutely rival the more expensive brands."

07 of 16 Teeki Women's Mermaid Hot Pant Buy It, from $85 Amazon For those looking to make a statement, these bright patterned leggings should do the trick. Designed with a higher rise waistband, four-way stretch, and made with breathable, recycled materials, they won't fall down, allow for freedom of movement, will keep you cool, and make you feel good while wearing them, too. "The best hot yoga pants I've ever owned," reported a customer. "They have a waistband that seems too big before practice, but as you sweat, they "stick to you" perfectly. The pants feel like a second skin."

08 of 16 Prana Becksa 7/8 Legging Buy It, $89 Prana Thanks to a soft, ribbed texture, chic high-rise cut, comfy flat-lock seams, and two large side pockets — a great solution for stashing your phone as you move — these yoga pants are as practical as they are cute whether you're headed to a yoga retreat or just running errands over the weekend. Plus, they boast built-in UPF 50+ to protect you from the sun if your practice takes you outdoors. "I have these leggings in three colorways now and love them!" shared a fan. "You can't go wrong with these leggings — they are perfect for yoga, hiking, climbing, lounging, or whatever else. And they have pockets!"

09 of 16 Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging Buy It, $99 Beyond Yoga Made with Beyond Yoga's signature buttery-soft Spacedye fabric, these women's yoga pants have a high-rise fit that won't slip, a comfortable midi length, and a wide, supportive five-inch waistband with a v-shape to add a little interest and style when worn just with a sports bra or bralette. It's received an impressive 4.9 rating from shoppers, with one claiming: "I'm not usually one to review items but these are amazing. I bought these in silver mist and they are the best leggings I've ever worn. Worth the money, without a doubt. They don't ride down during yoga workouts and are super comfy to lounge around in."

10 of 16 Hard Tail High Rise Ankle Leggings Buy It, $86 Zappos Get a little funky with Hard Tail's tie-dye-patterned leggings. They might not be the fold-over, boot-cut version of your high school days, but for many, the brand alone is a nostalgic throwback. Made with a cotton and spandex blend and high-rise elastic waistband, these pants will feel super comfortable and flexible. One reviewer wrote: "The fit was perfect, the comfort was fantastic, and [the] style with [the] high waist is very flattering. These leggings are the best for me practicing Iyengar yoga."

11 of 16 Bubblelime Women's High Waist Bootcut Yoga Pants Buy It, from $22 Amazon Rock the traditional yoga pants look with these flared, bootcut yoga pants. They're made with a super high waistband for comfort, stretchy fabric that'll move with you, and have a longer length that elongates the leg and falls right above your sneakers — sophisticated enough for lunch post-practice. Shape Editor-Approved: The Best Workout Sets, Starting at Just $30 "OMG, I am highly impressed with these yoga pants," raved a shopper. "They are great quality, have nice compression, the material is not the shedding kind, and they are not shiny. The price point is fantastic for this quality. I highly recommend them."

12 of 16 Patagonia Women's Centered Crops Buy It, $69 Patagonia These yoga pants are stretchy and cropped so you can easily see your foot placement on your mat. Not to mention, they are also moisture-wicking and quick-drying, meaning they can be worn for everything from hot flows to boot camps. Choose from four muted colorways — blue, gray, violet, and black — that will go with everything in your closet. "I have a couple of pairs and absolutely love them!" shared a customer. "They stay put at the waist and don't feel at all constrictive. I can do anything in them!"

13 of 16 Vuori Daily Legging Buy It, $84 Vuori Combining the comfort of yoga pants with the stylish silhouette of a jogger, these leggings have a high waist, a secure drawstring tie, a no-slip fit, and a 7/8 length that's slightly cropped at the ankle — meaning you'll want to wear them everywhere. One reviewer even said they stopped purchasing from another yoga competitor because these were just too good. The Best Joggers for Women That'll Dethrone Even Your Fave Leggings

14 of 16 Manduka Presence Legging Buy It, $88 Manduka This versatile legging is breathable and fast-drying, is made of supportive compression, has a flattering high waistband made with power mesh to hold you in while you move, and features two large side pockets for storing your phone — so you can have it handy when you want a friend to snap a photo of you in a headstand for the 'gram. One fan said: "These leggings are beautiful in color and so comfortable in their fit! The leggings are flexible, allowing me to really get deep into poses, yet they stay put and don't slip down my waist or thighs!"

15 of 16 IUGA High Waist Yoga Pants with Pocket Buy It, from $22 IUGA/Amazon While pockets are always a plus, having a thick-enough fabric that won't showcase your bum or panty lines is crucial when hitting downward dog, for instance. These best-selling leggings with four-way stretch boast side pockets big enough to hold your phone while you get your flow on, and users say they are totally squat-proof. And with more than 38,000 five-star ratings from Amazon customers, you really can't go wrong. The Best Leggings On Amazon, According to Customer Reviews "Exactly what you want in leggings/yoga pants," noted a shopper. "The texture of these leggings is SOFT! Well made and good quality fabric. I did the "squat test" and they DIDN'T BUDGE! Will purchase more in the future. See how you can't see my underwear or skin? Yeah it's AWESOME 👏🏼"
